alert.note: Alert for Northern Westchester; Rockland (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 2:46AM EST until January 17 at 9:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Glaze of Ice. Little additional snow and sleet accumulations, with a glaze of ice accretion. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northeast New Jersey, southern Connecticut and southeast New York. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on icy road conditions into the morning commute. Even though air temperatures will risen into the mid to upper 30s this morning, ground temperatures will be slow to rise above freezing until after daybreak. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.
